data.message: This is so fantastic my boyfriend is totally blind he will now be able to enjoy facebook & pictures wow thank u so much "Crying now" tears of joy!!!!

replies.message: Thanks for sharing your touching story with us, Carol. We hope your boyfriend enjoys it! -Abby
This is great Soo happy for the disabled 🙏🙏💗💗

Carol Watson my dad was blind from 13 on. He was President of Blind when I was 12, in Minnesota. What I would give to see him in this day and age!! I'm 70 in June.. Blessings to you &  your boyfriend!! I do know what it means!!! CELEBRATE My Sister in heart😄
Facebook Dear facebook please see the "Messenger" alot of ppl complaining about "How to delete the shared content. thank you

Yes, I am familiar with this update, it is really nice, the only question I have is what  do you do if it tells you that alt  text is not available, but otherwise it's a really huge breakthrough   thank you! :-)
